languages.text: {n}Абеляр поворачивается к вам и склоняется в почтительном поклоне.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! Для семьи Версериан сопровождать вас в столь важный момент — высочайшая честь! Не беспокойтесь, мы вас не подведем".

traits.locale_text: {n}Абеляр поворачивается к вам и склоняется в почтительном поклоне.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! Для семьи Версериан сопровождать вас в столь важный момент — высочайшая честь! Не беспокойтесь, мы вас не подведем".

languages.text: {n}Abelard turns to you and bows respectfully.{/n} "Lord Captain! To accompany you at such a critical hour is the greatest honour for the Werserian bloodline! Have no fear — we will not fail you."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр поворачивается к вам и склоняется в почтительном поклоне.{/n} "Лорд-капитан! Для семьи Версериан сопровождать вас в столь важный момент — высочайшая честь! Не беспокойтесь, мы вас не подведем".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard turns to you and bows respectfully.{/n} "Lord Captain! To be following you at such a critical hour is the greatest honor for House Werserian! Have no worry, we won't fail you."
{n}Abelard turns to you and bows respectfully.{/n} "Lord Captain! To be following you at such a critical hour is the greatest honor for House Werserian! Have no worry, we won't fail you."
{n}Abelard turns to you and bows respectfully.{/n} "Lord Captain! To accompany you at such a critical hour is the greatest honour for the Werserian bloodline! Have no fear — we will not fail you."
{n}Abelard turns to you and bows respectfully.{/n} "Lord Captain! To accompany you at such a critical hour is the greatest honour for the Werserian bloodline! Have no fear — we will not fail you."
{n}Abelard turns to you and bows respectfully.{/n} "Lord Captain! To accompany you at such a critical hour is the greatest honour for the Werserian bloodline! Have no fear — we will not fail you."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德转向你，恭敬地鞠了一躬。{/n}“舰长大人！能在这种关键时刻陪伴您，是我们韦尔森家族最大的荣耀！别担心，我们绝不会让您失望。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns to you and bows respectfully.{/n} "Lord Captain! To accompany you at such a critical hour is the greatest honour for the Werserian bloodline! Have no fear — we will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德转向你，恭敬地鞠了一躬。{/n}“舰长大人！能在这种关键时刻陪伴您，是我们韦尔森家族最大的荣耀！别担心，我们绝不会让您失望。”

languages.text: {n}Abelard se gira hacia ti y se inclina, respetuoso.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! ¡Poder acompañarle en un momento tan esencial es el mayor de los honores para el linaje Werserian! No tema, no le fallaremos».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns to you and bows respectfully.{/n} "Lord Captain! To accompany you at such a critical hour is the greatest honour for the Werserian bloodline! Have no fear — we will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard se gira hacia ti y se inclina, respetuoso.{/n} «¡Lord Capitán! ¡Poder acompañarle en un momento tan esencial es el mayor de los honores para el linaje Werserian! No tema, no le fallaremos».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドがこちらへ振り返り、尊敬の念をこめて一礼をする。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン様！このような大事な式典に共に出席できることはウェルザリアン家にとって最高の栄誉となります！ご安心ください―ご期待は裏切りません」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns to you and bows respectfully.{/n} "Lord Captain! To accompany you at such a critical hour is the greatest honour for the Werserian bloodline! Have no fear — we will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドがこちらへ振り返り、尊敬の念をこめて一礼をする。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン様！このような大事な式典に共に出席できることはウェルザリアン家にとって最高の栄誉となります！ご安心ください―ご期待は裏切りません」

languages.text: {n}Abelard wendet sich dir zu und verbeugt sich respektvoll.{/n} "Lord Captain! Euch in einer solch wichtigen Stunde zu begleiten, ist die größte Ehre für die Werserian-Blutlinie! Keine Angst – wir werden Euch nicht enttäuschen."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns to you and bows respectfully.{/n} "Lord Captain! To accompany you at such a critical hour is the greatest honour for the Werserian bloodline! Have no fear — we will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard wendet sich dir zu und verbeugt sich respektvoll.{/n} "Lord Captain! Euch in einer solch wichtigen Stunde zu begleiten, ist die größte Ehre für die Werserian-Blutlinie! Keine Angst – wir werden Euch nicht enttäuschen."

languages.text: {n}Abélard se tourne vers vous et vous fait une profonde révérence.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Il ne sera de plus grand honneur pour la lignée Werserian que de se tenir à vos côtés en ce moment si crucial ! N'ayez crainte. Nous ne vous décevrons pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns to you and bows respectfully.{/n} "Lord Captain! To accompany you at such a critical hour is the greatest honour for the Werserian bloodline! Have no fear — we will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard se tourne vers vous et vous fait une profonde révérence.{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine} ! Il ne sera de plus grand honneur pour la lignée Werserian que de se tenir à vos côtés en ce moment si crucial ! N'ayez crainte. Nous ne vous décevrons pas. »

languages.text: {n}Abelard sana doğru dönüp saygıyla eğiliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Size böylesi önemli bir anda eşlik etmek, Werserian ailesi için en büyük onurdur! Hiç endişe etmeyin, sizi yüzüstü bırakmayacağız."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard turns to you and bows respectfully.{/n} "Lord Captain! To accompany you at such a critical hour is the greatest honour for the Werserian bloodline! Have no fear — we will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard sana doğru dönüyor ve saygıyla eğiliyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan! Size böylesi önemli bir anda eşlik etmek Werserian ailesi için en büyük onurdur! Hiç endişe etmeyin, sizi yüzüstü bırakmayacağız."
